verbose_text: The KO myocardium exhibited substantially reduced chromatin binding of the general transcription factors TFIIB (XREF_FIG) and TFIID (TBP; XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY) at the NELF regulated metabolic genes, but not a number of metabolism unrelated genes whose transcription was not affected by NELF-B KO (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY).
evidence: binding of the general transcription factors TFIIB ( XREF_FIG ) and TFIID (TBP;  XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY ) at the NELF
